Player History
Injured on 4/15/1965 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1976...
Injured on 7/13/1976 with a Stiff Elbow, out for one week...
Injured on 6/27/1977 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for full season...
Released by Pittsburgh on 6/9/1980...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 2/3/1981 to a 1-year deal worth $450,000 per year...
Earned first career win on 6/8/1981...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (N) on 7/7/1982 (Going to NYM: P J. Tudor. Going to CHC: LF R. Roomes)...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1983...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1985...
